text: A bone marrow biopsy revealed the transformation of his CMML to acute myelogenous leukemia , and given his other underlying medical problems , we chose chemotherapy with subcutaneous Cystosine Arabinoside and 6-Thioguanine , which he tolerated without incident and this brought his white blood count down to below 1,000 , and his spleen shrank noticeably , but he still could not maintain a bump in platelet count with platelet transfusions .

text: The patient is a 79 year old gentleman with a history of an ascending aortic graft replacement in 1991 for aortic dissection .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: At that time the patient 's hospital course was complicated by a sternal wound infection requiring a sternal debridement and subsequent abdominal flap .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: The patient was then continued by report on Dicloxacillin for approximately one year following that reconstructive operation .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: The patient apparently did well until June 1998 when he noted a bulge in his sternal area .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: A ruptured aneurysm or pseudoaneurysm at the junction of the graft and arch was diagnosed and this was subsequently repaired .
labels: B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient then had recurrent bleeding two weeks later which was once again repaired .
labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O

text: However the same problem recurred for a third time and a computer tomogram scan at an outside hospital showed an anterior hematoma .
labels: O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: By report the patient was at that time told that there was no more that could be done for him and was then apparently placed on comfort measures and pain control at the outside hospital .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR O O O O O

text: However the patient was then subsequently transferred to Fairm of Ijordcompmac Hospital upon request of the family on 8/24/98 for further evaluation and possible intervention .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O B-TR O

text: The patient was evaluated by Dr. Rhalt of Dentvailr. Medical Center .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: As the patient 's early evaluation the patient underwent an aortogram which showed an ascending aortic graft with bulging flaps and a pseudoaneurysm at the anastomosis of the graft and arch just below the great vessels .
labels: O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-TE I-TE O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O

text: Upon admission , pt was febrile to 101.2 with U/A consistent with UTI .

text: A CT abd showed 8mm obstructing stone , hydro with stranding consistent with pylonephritis .

text: Her presentation was thought likely due to urosepsis given h/o foul smelling urine and in setting of stone w/ hydro + pyelo by CT. The patient went to IR on 2014-11-30 given evidence of right hydronephrosis on imaging for decompression and drainage. Upon admission , she was treated with Vancomycin and Gentamycin and Flagyl .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O B-PR O B-PR O B-PR O B-TE O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-TE O B-TR O B-TR O O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O

text: She was started on the MUST protocol with high dose steroids as well and a goal SVO2 >70% .

text: She was hypoxic requiring 3L nasal cannula O2 .
labels: O O B-PR O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: She subsequently developed hypotension with SBP in the 70s .
labels: O O O B-PR O B-TE O O O O

text: She was transferred to the CMED where the patient was continued on the MUST protocol with goais of CVP 10-12 , SVO2 greater than 70% .

text: The patient was bolused with NS and did not required pressors .
labels: O O O O O B-TR O O O O B-TR O

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR O

text: Repeat imaging revealed evidence of mild pulmonary congestion which was thought to account for the patient 's mild hypoxia .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Given that the patient had been maintaining a MAP of 60 without fluids or pressors , her goal CVP was decreased to >8 to avoid fluid overload .

text: The patient was continued on Vancomycin and Gentamycin while speciation and sensitivities were pending .
labels: O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O B-TE O B-TE O O O

text: Ciprofloxacin was added on 2014-12-01 for synergy when surveillance cultures were found to be growing again GNR .
labels: B-TR O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-PR O

text: Gent and Cipro were then discontinued and changed to meropenem when blood culture sensitivities became available revealing GNR sensitive to Jacoby but resistant to both Gent and Cipro .

labels: B-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O

text: Urine cultures from 11-30 grew STAPH AUREUS COAG + , and GRAM NEGATIVE RODS of two morphologies ( not further speciated ) .

labels: O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-PR O O O

text: The patient is a 49 year old woman with a metastatic adenocarcinoma of the breast who is status post high dose chemotherapy with PBSE and CCSS support ending June 1994 .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR O B-TR I-TR O O O O

text: She was admitted on 1-5-94 for fever , chest wall ulceration , cellulitis and pain control .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR O B-TR I-TR O

text: The patient first presented in October 1991 with a tender right axillary mass .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: A mammogram done in November 1990 was negative .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O

text: However , mammography repeated in October 1991 showed bilateral breast masses , suspicious for carcinoma .
labels: O O B-TE O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR O

text: Fine needle aspiration on October 23 , 1991 demonstrated atypical cells which occurred singly and in clusters .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O

text: Staging evaluation included normal liver function tests , normal blood counts and normal chest x-ray .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Bone scan showed degenerative joint disease in the shoulders and lumbar spine as well as increased radio chaser uptake in the breast bilaterally .
labels: B-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Dr. Berca Gachfrum performed a right modified mastectomy and left simple mastectomy on November 4 , 1991 .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O

text: The right modified radical mastectomy contained a 5.5 cm poorly differentiated , Grade III out of III infiltrating ductal carcinoma .
labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The margins were free of tumor , but 10 out of 21 lymph nodes were positive for metastatic carcinoma .
labels: O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: Furthermore there was a mass on the right pectoralis muscle which is supposed to be metastatic cancer .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: The left simple mastectomy also contained 5.5 cm poorly differentiated infiltrating ductal and intraductal carcinoma with extensive lymphatic vessel invasion .
labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O
B-TE I-TE O O O O O

text: The patient developed a large hematoma requiring surgical drainage .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR O

text: Therefore she had a Stage III-A adenocarcinoma of the breast .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Since she was at high risk for both local and metastatic recurrence of her tumor , she received both systemic chemotherapy and radiation therapy .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR O

text: The patient was treated with CMSAP , which is Cytoxan , Methotrexate , Leukovoranrescue , 5-FU , Adriamycin and Prednisone for four cycles .
labels: O O O O O B-TR O O O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O O O O

text: There were no dose reductions for mucositis or myelosuppression .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR O

text: However , following cycle 4 , she developed a flu-like illness , followed by fever , nonproductive cough and dyspnea on exertion .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR O B-PR I-PR O B-PR O O O

text: ABGs showed a pO2 of 79 , pH 7.44 , pO2 33 .
labels: B-TE O B-TE I-TE O O O B-TE O O B-TE O O

text: Chest x-ray showed diffuse interstitial infiltrates .
labels: B-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The differential diagnosis included viral pneumonitis , Mycoplasma , Chlamydia .
labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR O B-PR O

text: Basically in December 1993 , she returned to the Hem / Onc Clinic with chest wall nodules which turned out to be tumor recurrences and biopsied .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O

text: Although she had mediastinal recurrence , bone scan , head and liver CT were negative for metastatic disease .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: She was thus started on a Protocol of high dose chemotherapy with GCSF and peripheral stem cell support .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: Complications has mainly included myelosuppression and mucositis .
labels: B-PR O O O B-PR O B-PR O

text: She also developed Klebsiella UTI after the second cycle of high dose chemotherapy .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: It was treated with gent and Cipro .
labels: O O O O B-TR O B-TR O

text: Re-staging done in April 1993 showed a decrease in the pretracheal nodes with question of some lymphangitic spread versus some pneumonitis .
labels: B-TE O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O

text: In May 1994 she received her first course of thiotepa and Velban and Methotrexate , which required some red cell transfusions .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: In mid May she was admitted for fever and neutropenia and at that time had a UTI with blood clots in the urine .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient presents today with complaints of fever and a temperature of 100 .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR O B-TE I-TE O O O

labels: O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR O B-PR O

text: Chest x-ray - Showed a left paratracheal adenopathy and small left pleural effusion with no evidence of pneumonia .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O B-PR O

text: In summary , the patient is a 49 year old woman with metastatic breast cell CA , status post chemotherapy with CMSAP and PVSC and XRT who presented with fever , four days of diarrhea , nausea and vomiting and had been on Keflex for an erythema on her left chest wall .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O O O B-PR O O O O B-PR O B-PR O B-PR O O O O B-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The Keflex was stopped when she developed the diarrhea .
labels: B-TR I-TR O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: When she arrived the plan was to go ahead and treat here rythematous induration and possible cellulitis with IV antibiotics .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR O B-TR I-TR O

text: So she was put on dicloxicillin and we did local wound care with an agent called Santyl , which is a collagenace ondebrided which worked very well for her .
labels: O O O O O B-TR O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR O B-TR O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O

text: Also at the time of admission we were also considering palliative Taxol chemotherapy , which the patient declined .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O

text: She refused the Taxol therapy so that was not done .
labels: O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O

text: Another major issue with this patient was pain control .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: She had been in a whole lot of pain from her left arm lesion .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: So pain control was a big issue so she was on MS Contin and MSIR at home she thought that clouded her thinking , so we tried different things for pain management .
labels: O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: One of them was to do a subarachnoid neurologic block at C6-C7 interface on 1-6-94 .
labels: O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: After that the patient had minimal relief of pain .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR O

text: However , she declined further blocks , which were offered to her .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O

text: So accepted to be on dilaudid p.o. which was started at a dosage of 2-4 meg but since then we have tapered it up .
labels: O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: She is now getting dilaudid 8 mg q2h and in addition she has been on fentanyl patch .
labels: O O O O B-TR O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: She is now getting 75 micrograms per hour of the fentanyl patch which is changed every 72 hours .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O

text: We can go up by 25 mg on the fentanyl patch as needed to control her pain and we can always go up on the dilaudid because she is still in considerable amount of pain .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O B-PR O

text: Other things that happened during this admission - we obtained ahead CT for her on the 8th of January because of her clouded thinking and altered mental status , which was probably due to the morphine that she was taking .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O

text: We went ahead and got a head CT scanand it showed no enhancing lesions .
labels: O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: In addition her liver transaminases were elevated , we thought about doing further work-up , but that was deferred because the patient wanted to wait on that .
labels: O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-PR O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
O O O O O

text: The patient on January 13 became hyponatremic .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR O

text: Her sodium went down to 121 and before that on admission she was 133 .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: A renal consult was obtained and their assessment was that this was probably a mixture of hypovolemia as well as SIADH .
labels: O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O B-PR O O O B-PR O

text: We proceeded to do for her hyponatremia - we gave her some fluid and her urine sodium became higher than her serum sodium ; we stopped it .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O

text: We had given her some normal saline and then we proceeded to just do fluid restriction .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: In addition we gave her a sodium chloride one gram per day and that also helped , so that now at the time of discharge , the patient 's sodium is between 126 and 129 ; prior to that it had gone down to as low 116.
labels: O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
O O O O O O

text: We suggest continuing increased salt intake in her diet and also continuing with the fluid restriction of free water intake to one liter per day .
labels: O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O

text: On the 14th of January , the patient developed increased shortness of breath and chest x-ray was taken showed a wedge shaped infiltrate in the right upper lobe which was consistent with Hampton 's hump .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Also a VQ scan obtained the next day showed high probability for PE .
labels: O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O B-PR O

text: So we proceeded to put her on heparin for anticoagulation and then when she was therapeutic on heparin , we went ahead and started her on coumadin and she is currently on coumadin at 2.5 mg q.h.s.
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O O O O O O O B-TR O O O O O O O O B-TR O O O O O B-TR O O O O
B-TE I-TE O O O

text: We want her INR to remain between 2 and 3 .
labels: O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O

text: So if it goes much lower than 2 , then we would consider increasing it to perhaps coumadin 2.5 and 5 alternating every other night .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR O O O O O O O O

text: However , we would leave it at 2.5 for now .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Other major issues - As a result of all the things happened and with her hyponatremia and also the other problems , her blood pressure was elevated also .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-PR O O

text: We put her on nifedipine IR , SL and that was not enough to control her blood pressure which was in the 200s in the systolic , so we had started her on atenolol .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O B-TR O

text: So on discharge she is on atenolol 100 .

text: The patient also has significant edema in both arms now and also some mild edema in the lower extremities , so I think that fluid restriction should help with that .

text: 68M with multiple vascular risk factors presents with acute onset right-sided hemiparesis and dysarthria , aphasia concerning for acute left MCA infarct .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR O B-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Patient arrived in Daniel within 3 hours of symptom onset and head CT showed no evidence of bleed .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE O O O O B-PR O

text: However , as wife had not seen patient before he became symptomatic , there was some concern that he had symptoms earlier than 6 am , and therefore would be outside the 3 hour window for TPA .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR O

text: MRI was performed which showed diffusion abnormalities but no hyperintensity on T2 / FLAIR imaging supporting the acute onset .
labels: B-TE O O O O B-PR I-PR O O B-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O

text: Therefore , IV tpa thrombolytics were administered within 3 hours of symptom onset .
labels: O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: Within minutes the patient showed decreased right sided weakness and improved from a global aphasia to an anterior aphasia picture .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Given the likely embolic etiology of infarct , carotid doppler and TTE were performed .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR O B-TE I-TE O B-TE O O O

text: Doppler revealed no hemodynamically significant lesions bilaterally .
labels: B-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Echo did not reveal potential source of emboli , but showed striking left ventricle akinesis and hypokinesis presumbly due to past MI x 2 .
labels: B-TE O O O O O O B-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR O O O B-PR I-PR O O O

text: Given that the stroke occurred while taking aspirin and plavix , and given the severe akinesis of the left ventricle , we decided to initiate anticoagulation with warfarin to help prevent future strokes .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR O O O B-TR O B-TR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: Anticoagulation therapy was initiated with heparin and coumadin beginning on the evening of 2016-08-23 .
labels: B-TR I-TR O O O B-TR O B-TR O O O O O O O

text: The patient and his wife , a nurse , were educated on low molecular wt heparin , which was started in the hospital on 2015-08-26 with close follow-up scheduled with Dr. Demmert of the Wareham VA primary care clinic the next morning .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: His depakote was continued for his bipolar disorder .
labels: B-TR I-TR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: On discharge , strength was nearly intact in the limbs , though he still had a right-sided facial droop .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Additionally , he still had mild dysarthria and mild anterior aphasia .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Additionally , risk factor modification was continued .
labels: O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: Lipid panel was checked and showed good control of lipids on his home dose of zocor .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

labels: O O O O O B-PR O O B-TE I-TE O O O O B-TE O B-PR I-PR O O O

text: He may need further glucose monitoring in the future .
labels: O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O

labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-TR I-TR O

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O

labels: O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O

text: In addition , she was empirically started on Flagyl for persistent diarrhea ( despite negative C. diff cultures ) , however she developed an additional rash on her buttocks after the first dose of flagyl , so the flagyl was discontinued .

text: HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS AND HOSPITAL COURSE :
labels: O O O O O O O O

text: Mr. Breath was a 32 year old previously healthy unbelted driver whose car was hit at high speed by a vehicle driven by an intoxicated driver .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient was ejected and his vehicle rolled over , possibly over him .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: He was found awake at the scene , complaining of abdominal pain .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: He had a blood pressure of 60 systolic upon arrival of the Giles Min General Hospital crew .
labels: O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O O O
B-TR I-TR O O O

text: He was paralyzed and endotracheally intubated , and a 14 gauge catheter was inserted in his left chest because of poor breath sounds .
labels: O O B-PR O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He arrived at the Fairm of Ijordcompmac Hospital at 02:30 with a blood pressure of 86 and a heart rate of 170 .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O

text: Large bore cannulas were inserted into the femoral veins , bilateral chest tubes were placed , and his blood pressure rose to 110 systolic after two liters of crystalloid .
labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O B-TR O

text: He had an ecchymosis over the medial right costal margin and his abdomen was distended .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O
B-TE I-TE O O O O B-TE O O

text: The abdominal tap was grossly positive for blood .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: His blood pressure fell to 60 systolic as he was being transferred to the computerized tomography scan table ; the scan was aborted and he was taken directly to the operating room at 03:00 .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: At laparotomy , there was a liter of blood in the peritoneal cavity .
labels: O B-TR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: There was a class II laceration of the left liver at the falciform ligament which was actively bleeding , a tear of the transverse mesocolon from its base to the bowel wall with active bleeding , a 7 cm serosal tear of the adjacent transverse colon , and a large central retroperitoneal hematoma .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Control of the super-celiac aorta was obtained , and both left and right sided " Mattox " maneuvers were performed .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: The retroperitoneum was opened , with vigorous bleeding resulting .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O

text: This was controlled , necessitating ten minutes of aortic clamping and found to have originated from the rupture of the left renal vein one centimeter from its junction with the inferior vena cava .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The vein was divided and suture ligated .
labels: O O O O O B-TR O O

text: Bleeding from the liver was controlled with sutures .
labels: B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-TR O

text: The tears in the transverse mesocolon and colon serosa were repaired .
labels: B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O

text: The examination of the remainder of the abdominal contents revealed no other injury ; in particular , the entire anterior surface and the immediately juxtaduodenal posterior surface of the pancreas were normal .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient was now very stable , and he was taken to the Respiratory Intensive Care Unit .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient had received ten units of packed red blood cells , five units of fresh frozen plasma , seven units of platelets , and nine liters of Ringer 's lactate .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O B-TR O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: Upon admission , he was treated for his pneumonia .

text: He was medically managed for CHF and underwent a cardiac catheterization on 2014-03-06 .
labels: O O O O O B-PR O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O

text: His catheterization revealed 70% stenosis of the distal left main coronary artery , 90% stenosis of the LAD , 80% stenosis of the circumflex , 90% stenosis of OM2 and a proximally occluded right coronary artery .
labels: B-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Over the ensuing days , Mr. Nina CHF was managed by the CCU Team and he received treatment for what was now determined to be a Klebsiella pneumonia .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O O O B-TR O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He was treated with a full course of Zosyn .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR O

text: On 2014-03-11 , Mr. Knueppel went to the Operating Room with Dr. Streeter .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: He underwent a coronary artery bypass graft of four vessels .
labels: O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: He had a saphenous vein graft to his LAD and diagonal in a sequential fashion , saphenous vein graft to his PDA and a saphenous vein graft to his OM .

text: Mr. Knueppel had a long postoperative course .
labels: O O O O O O O O

text: His postoperative course was complicated by hypertension which was managed medically .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR O O O O O

text: During his postoperative course , he did not suffer from any arrhythmias nor did he have any episode of hypotension .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O B-PR O

text: At the time of discharge , he was on a stable antihypertensive regimen appropriate for someone with a decreased ejection fraction .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Mr. Knueppel had had a long protracted period of intubation prior to the operation .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-TR O O O B-TR O

text: The status of Mr. Nina pulmonary system necessitated a prolonged postoperative intubation .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: After a very slow wean from ventilatory support , Mr. Knueppel was successfully extubated on postoperative day number nine .
labels: O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: He continued to be very tenuous from a pulmonary point of view and required frequent chest PT .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: For this reason , Mr. Knueppel was kept in the Intensive Care Unit where very close monitoring could be performed .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: In addition , he had chest PT performed at very regular intervals by the ICU staff .
labels: O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O

text: His pulmonary status was so tenuous that we were unable to transfer him to the regular patient care floor during his hospitalization .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Mr. Knueppel had an emergent cricothyroidotomy followed by a formal tracheostomy at the outside hospital .
labels: O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O

text: There is much scarring surrounding his larynx .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Such a situation frequently makes it very difficult to swallow without aspirating .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: As is expected , Mr. Knueppel failed a swallowing study early on in his Boston Regional Medical Centerr hospital course .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The study was repeated and yet again Mr. Knueppel was unable to swallow without evidence of aspiration .

text: The patient is a 65 year old male who sustained a small myocardial infarction first in 1978 , with course thereafter including a coronary artery bypass graft by Dr. Wierst ______________at Noughwell Entanbon Health in 1986 .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O

text: In 1991 he presented with congestive heart failure and he underwent porcine aortic valve replacement .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: In the seven to eight months preceding admission , he developed recurrent angina with dyspnea on exertion .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR O O O

text: The patient was admitted for cardiac catheterization in early December , 1993 .
labels: O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O
O O O O

labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O B-TR O O O O O B-TR O O O O O O O B-TR O O O O O B-TR O O O O O B-TR O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: Remarkable for an oriented , alert male in no acute distress with decreased breath sounds at the right base consistent with effusion and a 3/6 systolic murmur consistent with aortic stenosis .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR O
B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O

text: Cardiac catheterization demonstrated elevated right and left-sided filling pressures at rest , with pulmonary hypertension and normal cardiac index .
labels: B-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O

text: There was severe aortic stenosis of 70 millimeter peak gradient , native three vessel disease with patent left internal mammary artery graft to the left circumflex , dissection of the left main was induced by the catheter tip .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: A patent right internal mammary artery to the left anterior descending artery and diagonal was noted , and a patent saphenous vein graft to the posterior descending artery was present .
labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: Also of note , pulmonary edema was induced by dye and anxiety and treated with Lasix , Morphine , oxygen and nitroglycerin .
labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O B-TR O B-PR O O O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O

text: Post-procedure he was admitted to the CCU because of the history of left main dissection .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He remained hemodynamically stable but of note , would not tolerate a transesophageal echo because of anxiety-he would not swallow the probe .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O B-PR O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: Transthoracic echo demonstrated gradients of 100 peak and 65 mean across the aortic valve and there was mild aortic insufficiency and ejection fraction was noted to be 18% with global hypokinesis .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: The next several days were remarkable for events in which the patient was quite agitated and was evaluated by Psychiatry and treated with Ativan .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O B-TR O

text: The patient was then evaluated by Cardiac Surgery for probable re-do aortic valve replacement and possible re-do coronary artery bypass grafting .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: In the course of preoperative workup , Mr. Has was evaluated completely by Psychiatry with diagnoses including underlying chronic depression well-controlled on Prozac , underlying organ brain vulnerability of unclear etiology , possibly microvascular infarct , acute paranoid and belligerent behavior , possibly due to medications .
labels: O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O B-TR O

text: On December 12 the patient underwent surgery , including a re-do aortic valve replacement with # 25 St. Jude and re-do coronary artery bypass grafting times one ; saphenous vein graft to the posterior descending artery as a veno-venous jump graft .
labels: O O O O O O B-TR O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: The patient was admitted to the Surgical Intensive Care Unit postoperatively with stable hemodynamics on Lidocaine at one , Dobutamine at 200 and Nipride .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR O O O B-TR O O O B-TR O

text: The patient was extubated by postoperative day # 1 but was noted to be relatively hypoxemic with high oxygen requirement .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O
B-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR O

text: Aggressive diuresis was undertaken and the patient responded , albeit sluggishly .
labels: B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O
O O O O O B-PR O

text: This was attributed to mild hypoxia and / or his underlying psychiatric diagnoses and he was treated with Haldol appropriately .
labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-TR O O

text: On day # 2 the patient continued to diurese and this was maintained with the Lasix/ Mannitol infusion .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: His urine output remained at 150 to 200 cc. an hour .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O

text: Despite this , his chest x-ray continued to show severe pulmonary edema and the clinical picture correlated .
labels: O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O

text: He required anti-hypertensive therapy initially with Nipride which was changed to Hydralazine to avoid shunting .
labels: O O B-TR I-TR O O B-TR O O O O B-TR O O B-PR O

text: He received several units of packed red blood cells to increase his hematocrit and oncotic pressure .
labels: O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O B-TE I-TE O B-TE I-TE O

text: Very early in the morning on postoperative day # 3 , the patient became acutely hypoxic after several hours of marginal oxygenation with respiratory rates in the thirties and the patient was urgently intubated , without complication .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O

text: With positive pressure ventilation and continued diuresis , his arterial blood gases improved .
labels: O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O

text: Throughout this he remained hemodynamically stable .
labels: O O O O O O O

text: Exception was a ten beat run of ventricular tachycardia which was thought to be ischemic in origin and treated with nitrates and Lidocaine .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O

text: His chest x-ray blossomed to demonstrate pulmonary infiltrate and the patient began to produce sputum .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-PR O

text: Infectious Disease consultation was obtained for evaluation of his purulent sputum and the patient was covered with Vancomycin , Ceftazidime and Gentamicin .
labels: O O O O O O B-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O

text: Cardiology evaluation commented on the patient 's increasing ventricular ectopy and suggested that these were due to an R and T phenomenon from his pacer in the setting of prolonged QT interval .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O
O B-TR I-TR O O O

text: In addition , the patient was given magnesium to bring his level above 2 .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR O O B-TE I-TE O O O

text: On the evening of the 18th , the patient continued to remain hemodynamically stable , although his oxygenation was clearly deteriorating and more marginal .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O
O O B-TR O B-TE O O O

text: It was increased to 65% with pO2 of 81 .
labels: O O O O O O B-TE O O O

text: At approximately 7:50 a.m. , house officer was called to the room for blood pressure of 70/40 with falling oxygen saturations .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was immediately given 400 mg. of Calcium Chloride i.v. push and ventilator disconnected and the patient manually ventilated .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: Within one minute , the patient lost his blood pressure and CPR was initiated and code was called .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-TR O O O O O O O

text: The patient initially continued to have rhythm consistent with EMV and he was bolused with Levophed and given some volume while compressions continued .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-PR O O O O O B-TR O O O O O B-TR O O

text: The patient 's prothrombin time had been 23 early the same morning and tamponade was considered and thoracotomy instruments obtained .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O B-PR O O O B-TR I-TR O O

text: The chest was opened partially and through sub-xyphoid area it was determined that there was no evidence of tamponade .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O

text: Compressions were continued and adequate pulse was felt and arterial blood gases demonstrated adequate oxygenation and perfusion .
labels: B-TR O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O

text: The patient 's rhythm degenerated to ventricular tachycardia and he was shocked , initially without response but after several doses of Epinephine , one-half mg. of Atropine and a bolus of Lidocaine we were able to obtain a blood pressure and rhythm only briefly , and quickly deteriorated back to ventricular fibrillation .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR O O O O B-TR O O O O B-TR O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-TE O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: Further attempts at resuscitation were unsuccessful and the patient was pronounced dead at 8:30 a.m.
labels: O O O B-TR O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The family has been notified and autopsy consent has been obtained .

text: Mr. Le is a seventy three year old male who presents to the Fairm of Ijordcompmac Hospital , following a self inflicted gunshot wound to the head .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Mr. Le was found in bed with a 32 caliber revolver at his side .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient was apparently alone at home , his neighbors heard a single shot , and the paramedics were called .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Upon arrival , they found the patient in bed , with notes nearby , listing his funeral home preferences and information on his next of kin .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient indicates that his neighbors were making excessive noise upstairs from his dwelling , and he found it unbearable .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: He therefore decided to take his life with a gun which he had found in the house .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Apparently , the gun belonged to his father .
labels: O O O O O O O O O

text: On further questioning , the patient described that his father passed away approximately forty to fifty years prior to his admission , and the gun was found in a box in their home .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient expressed concern that he had several utility bills that he was unable to pay .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient 's sister died eight years prior to the patient 's admission of leukemia , and he otherwise has no next of kin with the exception of one brother in Washington , with whom his relationship is tenuous .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: On initial questioning , however , the patient denies any recent losses .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: On admission , the patient denies any suicidal or homicidal ideation .

text: The patient is a 28 - year-old , gravida 3 , para 1 , at approximately 27 weeks gestation , who was admitted on 2014-05-12 due to increasing symptoms of congestive heart failure .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: She has known dilated cardiomyopathy with a baseline ejection fraction of approximately 25% .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O

text: She had been managed as an outpatient during her pregnancy and was on multiple medications including Lasix 40 mg daily , Hydralazine 25 mg daily , Toprol XL 100 mg daily , digoxin 0.5 mg daily and Lovenox 40 mg twice daily subcutaneously .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-TR O O O O B-TR O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O B-TR O O O O B-TR O O O O O O

text: She also took albuterol on a p.r.n. basis for her asthma .
labels: O O O B-TR O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: She has known allergy to penicillin , vancomycin and erythromycin .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR O B-TR O B-TR O B-TR O

text: She was evaluated upon presentation by the Maternal Fetal Medicine attending on call as well as by Cardiology .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: She was found to have symptoms of congestive heart failure as well as decreased fetal movement .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Fetal monitoring initially on admission was appropriate for gestational age .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O
O O O

text: On physical exam , she was noted to have bilateral lower extremity edema , mildly elevated pressures in the 140 to 150/90 range , and jugular venous distension .
labels: O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O
O O O

text: After consultation with Cardiology as well as Anesthesia on call that evening , it was decided to transfer the patient to the ICU for intensive monitoring .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O
B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: The patient was carefully diuresed over the next 48 hours .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Symptoms of congestive heart failure gradually abated over the next 48 to 72 hours .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient was given antenatal corticosteroids for fetal lung maturity .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O

text: A Neonatology consultation was obtained during the course of the hospitalization .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: After discussion , it was decided to attempt to obtain 28 weeks gestation and then deliver electively by cesarean section given the decompensation in the third trimester .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-PR I-PR O O O O O

text: The patient underwent primary low transverse cesarean section on 2014-05-19 at approximately 28 weeks gestation .
labels: O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O

text: The cesarean section was performed on the West Campus in the Cardiothoracic Surgical Suite .
labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: This was performed in this location in case any acute cardiac decompensation occurred during the time of cesarean section .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: Cardiothoracic Surgery was on standby during the surgery .
labels: O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: The patient went to the cardiac Intensive Care Unit on the West Campus postoperatively .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: She did well during the postoperative period .
labels: O O O O O O O O

text: She required several episodes of diuresis due to increasing shortness of breath on postoperative day #1 and postoperative day #2 due to worsening symptoms of shortness of breath from fluid shifts that normally occur during the postpartum period .
labels: O O O O O B-TR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O

text: The patient was transferred to the West Campus on postoperative day #2 in stable condition .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: She did well during the remainder of her postoperative course and was continued on her medication regimen that she had been on during the antepartum period .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O

text: She was discharged to home on postoperative day #4 .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O

text: She was to followup with Maternal Fetal Medicine in 5 to 7 days .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: She had followup with her primary cardiologist in Shaugnessy-Kaplan Rehab Hospital scheduled for 1 week postoperatively .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Of note , the patient also underwent tubal ligation at the time of cesarean section .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: This 78-year-old woman had stage IIIB carcinoma of the cervix and she has known periaortic and splenic metastases .
labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: She was discharged from the hospital about 18 days prior to her admission , following a month long stay .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: When her cancer was diagnosed , she underwent total abdominal hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy and pelvic lymphadenectomy .
labels: O B-PR I-PR O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR O

text: She had extensive disease of the uterus , ovarian tubes , omentum and the periaortic lymph nodes .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Postoperatively , she developed ileus , then finally she recovered and she was discharged to the nursing home .
labels: O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: She was readmitted because of a problem with uremia and high BUN and creatinine when she seen in the office and the BUN and creatinine was ordered .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O B-TE O O O

text: The BUN was 70 and creatinine was 4.6 and for this reason she had ultrasound of the kidney which showed bilateral hydronephrosis .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O B-TE O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was admitted to the hospital for ureteral stent placement .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: On the day of admission , she was generally stable and she had no evidence of disease in the pelvis , no bleeding and no other abnormality .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR O O B-PR I-PR O
O O O

text: Dr. Jescdrig was called and a consultation was done and he placed bilateral ureteral stents in her kidneys .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O
O O O O O O O

text: She had dropped her BUN and creatinine to normal and she was found to have may be metastatic disease to her skin on the right paraumbilical area .
labels: O O O B-TE I-TE O B-TE O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O

text: Because of her age and mental condition and the fact that she had cerebral atrophy , the decision was made for comfort unless she has any further problem and no further chemotherapy or treatment will be given .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-TR O B-TR O O O O

text: The possibility that she may need to receive radiation therapy to this area to prevent her from getting further obstruction was also brought up .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O

text: Her family felt that at the present time , because her condition was no good , they would like to just take her home so that she could enjoy the quality of life .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Indeed , at the time of discharge she was conscious and she was cooperative and she was able to communicate very nicely with everyone including her family , except for the mental instability that she had because of her cerebral atrophy due to senility .

text: The patient is a 74 year old female with metastatic papillary carcinoma of the thyroid who presented to the Fairm of Ijordcompmac Hospital on 4/28/93 with progressive weakness , weight loss and shortness of breath .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was in a good state of health until January of 1993 when she developed a serious upper respiratory tract infection associated with weakness and fatigue .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR O B-PR O

text: She had also reported a weight loss of 15 pounds over the past two months .
labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O

text: Although her upper respiratory tract infection seemed to be resolving , her weakness persisted .
labels: O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O

text: A work up begun by her internist , Dr. Brain , revealed a white blood cell count of 49,000 with 50% eosinophils .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-TE I-TE O

text: She was admitted to Box Memorial Hospital Nursing Home for further evaluation .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O

labels: O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O

text: The liver function tests showed an alkaline phosphatase of 303 , LDH 310 , SGOT 66 , albumin 2.5 .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-TE O O B-TE O O B-TE O O

text: A peripheral blood smear showed mature eosinophils in increased numbers .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O B-PR I-PR O
B-TE I-TE O O O

text: A bone scan showed increased uptake at the manubrium at the site of an old fracture , as well as in the right supraclavicular area .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O

text: A thyroid ultrasound showed an inferior thyroid mass .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: This was followed by an abdominal CT which showed an enlarged spleen , a lytic lesion on the right iliac bone and a benign renal cyst .
labels: O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Biopsy of the lytic lesion was consistent with metastases papillary carcinoma of the thyroid .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O
B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O

text: The small bowel follow through was within normal limits .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O

text: A thyroid scan revealed decreased function and displacement of the thyroid by a cold mass located inferiorly with calcifications on the right side .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: A chest CT also revealed a small pulmonary nodule with a necrotic mass involving the right lung posteriorly .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O

text: The patient was subsequently referred to the Fairm of Ijordcompmac Hospital under the service of Dr. Brain .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: She continued to have profound weakness , a decreased appetite and weight loss .
labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O

text: She also developed lower extremity edema as well as left upper extremity swelling associated with increased shortness of breath on exertion .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O

text: The patient was admitted to Dr. Shatermivaet S Brain on 4/28/93 with a history of papillary carcinoma of the thyroid with bone involvement and possible lung involvement .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR O

text: Work up was begun for the possible myeloproliferative / myelodysplastic disorder associated with the hyper-eosinophilic syndrome .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Accordingly , an Oncology consult was called on 4/29/93 and a bone marrow aspirate biopsy was performed .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O

text: This revealed maturation of leukocytes to all stages with markedly increased eosinophilic proliferation .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: A lung biopsy was performed on 4/30/93 without definitive results .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O

text: During this time the patient 's coagulation status had improved with Vitamin K therapy with PTs normalizing .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TE O O
O O O O O O
O O O O O O

text: The patient continued to suffer from edema of the left upper extremity and a Vascular Radiology consult revealed a thrombosis of the left subclavian vein extending into the axillary vein .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O

text: There was some thrombosis of the left internal jugular vein as well .

text: A head CT was performed and was completely negative for any metastatic process involving the brain .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O

text: Thus , a heparin sliding scale was begun .
labels: O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: Meanwhile , the patient 's eosinophilia was treated with a trial of prednisone .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: She also developed a mild urinary tract infection which responded to Bactrim , but which was subsequently stopped because of diarrhea .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-TR O O O O O O O O B-PR O

text: The conclusions at this time of the thyroid cytologist , as well as the bone pathologist , were that the findings were diagnostic of papillary thyroid carcinoma with pulmonary metastases .

text: Dr. Trial was subsequently consulted on 5/5 for surgical intervention .

labels: O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient is a 52 - year-old female with no known history of cardiac disease presenting with dyspnea on exertion and chest tightness , who was admitted for evaluation and management of her symptoms .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O B-PR O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O B-TE O B-TR O B-PR I-PR O
O O O

text: The patient was admitted for complaints of dyspnea on exertion and chest pressure which could be consistent with angina .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR O

text: However , given the long duration of the symptoms and negative workup in the past , it was thought to be unlikely .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: However , the patient was started on an aspirin as well as a beta blocker , and a rule out myocardial infarction protocol was initiated .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O

text: A stress thallium was planned for the day following admission .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O

text: However , on the night of admission the patient was found lying in her bed diaphoretic and obtunded , and a code was called .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR O O O O O O O

text: Further examination revealed a strong palpable pulse with a systolic blood pressure in the 130 s and a heart rate in the 80 s.
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O

text: Over the course of the next few minutes the patient became increasingly more responsive .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: She was treated with a fluid bolus .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: The patient quickly responded to a fluid bolus and became interactive .
labels: O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O

text: She reported that she was sitting on the commode urinating and began to feel nauseous and presyncopal .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR O

text: She was able to get to bed at which point she passed out .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: She denied any chest pain or pressure , and no shortness of breath during this event .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O

text: A rhythm check obtained during the time of this event demonstrated a pause of six seconds followed by a junctional escape rhythm .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: An electrocardiogram obtained after the code demonstrated no acute changes .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: Her acute bradycardic event was felt likely secondary to her new beta blocker in conjunction with a vagal response .
labels: B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: It was determined to stop the beta blocker , and atropine was placed at the bedside .
labels: O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O B-TR O O O O O O

text: On the following day the patient underwent an echocardiogram which demonstrated dilated right ventricle secondary to chronic dysfunction and a pulmonary artery pressure of greater than 100 .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O
B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O

text: A CT angiogram was ordered to evaluate for chronic thromboembolic disease as a potential cause of her pulmonary hypertension .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: She was ruled out for myocardial infarction with three sets of normal enzymes and continued to be monitored on telemetry .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE O

text: A Pulmonary consultation was obtained to evaluate for possible etiology of the patient 's hypotension .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: There was little evidence to suggest any cardiac disease , and given the patient 's Grave's disease an autoimmune process was felt to be possible .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O

text: In addition , consideration was given to sarcoidosis , human immunodeficiency virus , and drug-induced given her history of herbal medication use .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O

text: It was recommended that the patient begin anticoagulation given the severity of her pulmonary hypertension .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: It was also planned to undergo a right heart catheterization with a vasodilation trial by the catheterization laboratory .
labels: O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O

text: A right heart catheterization was performed on 2014-12-05 .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O

text: A pharmacologic pulmonary vasodilator challenge was performed with a positive response .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O

text: In addition , a CT angiogram of the chest with pulmonary embolism protocol showed no intravascular filling defect but did show a right upper lobe ground-glass and scattered adenopathy .
labels: O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O

text: Therefore , in the end left atrial hypertension was essentially ruled out as a primary cause .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O

text: Chronic pulmonary embolus was less likely given her negative CT angiogram .
labels: B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O

text: Chronic lung disease was unlikely given the patient 's normal pulmonary function tests and DLCO in 2012 as well as a normal CT angiogram .
labels: B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE O O O O O O O O O O

text: Collagen vascular disease could not be definitively ruled out ; however , given the patient 's lack of connective tissue disorder stigmata it was thought to be less likely , and the patient 's human immunodeficiency virus test was negative .
labels: B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O

text: Therefore , it was felt that the patient was most likely experiencing a primary pulmonary hypertension .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Consideration was given to treating the patient with a course of calcium channel blocker ; however , given the patient 's poor response to Lopressor , it was determined that this would not be optimal treatment for the patient 's pulmonary hypertension .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O B-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Therefore , her insurance company was contacted regarding the potential of Flolan as a treatment .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR O O O O

text: Plans were made for placement of a Hickman catheter and initiation of Flolan treatment .
labels: O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: However , on 12-07 , the patient once again experienced an episode of unresponsiveness .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O

text: Upon arrival by the physician the patient was awake , alert , and oriented with a pulse in the 80 s, with pressure in the 80 s, and satting 100% on room air .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O B-TE O O O O O O O O O O O

text: She described this episode as an uncomfortable feeling in her chest .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was treated with 2 liters of intravenous fluids with a bump in her systolic blood pressure to the 90 s.
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O

text: Review of telemetry revealed an 8 to 9 beat episode of nonsustained ventricular tachycardia followed by an episode of bradycardia to 60 beats per minute .
labels: O O B-TE O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O

text: The etiology of these cardiovascular episodes was unclear , but was felt likely secondary to the patient 's tenuous cardiovascular status given the fact that she had clear pulmonary hypertension , was very preload dependent , and had an intact left ventricular function but with cardiac output limited due to left ventricular compression by a dilated left ventricle .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Given the patient 's persistent hypotensive episodes , and decreased urine output , she was transferred back to the Medical Intensive Care Unit for management prior to initiation of Flolan therapy .
labels: O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: On 12-08 , the Hickman catheter was placed in preparation of Flolan administration .
labels: O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O B-TR O O

text: During the Mass. Mental Health Center Medical Intensive Care Unit stay , the patient was found to exquisitely preload dependent and responded well to aggressive fluids as needed to maintain her blood pressure with a systolic of greater than 90 .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-TE I-TE O O O O O

text: She had no further episodes of bradycardia during her Medical Intensive Care Unit stay .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O O

text: In addition , the patient 's urine output improved dramatically with hydration therapy , suggesting her low urine output was secondary to decreased cardiac output secondary to low preload .
labels: O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-TR I-TR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR O

text: The patient continued to be followed by the Electrophysiology Service , who determined that the patient was demonstrating severe vasal sensitivity with bradycardia necessitating pacemaker placement .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR O B-TR I-TR O

text: This was to be deferred until after the patient had her Hickman in place .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O

text: Because the patient 's pulmonary pressures responded so well to adenosine during right heart catheterization , it was thought that the patient would be a good candidate for Flolan therapy .
labels: O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O B-TR O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: Flolan was initiated on 12-08 at 5 nanograms per kilogram per minute .
labels: B-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient was monitored for symptoms of Flolan therapy including nausea , vomiting , first bite jaw claudication , or hypotension .
labels: O O O O O B-PR O B-TR I-TR O B-PR O B-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR O

text: Over the course of the hospital stay the patient 's Flolan dose was titrated to receive maximum benefit without precipitating symptoms of Flolan overdose .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was felt to be stable on her current Flolan dose and was therefore transferred back to the floor .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O

text: A high resolution CT was requested to further evaluate for possible secondary cause of her primary pulmonary hypertension ; however , the patient refused it at this time .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Plans for placement of a pacemaker were initiated .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O

text: However , on the night prior to the planned surgical date the patient suffered an episode of bleeding from her Hickman catheter site .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O

text: Surgery was notified and pressure was applied ; however , it did not stop oozing .
labels: O O O O B-TR O O O O O O O O O O O

text: A surgicel dressing was placed and prolonged pressure resulted in resolution of the bleeding .
labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: In addition , an extra stitch was placed in an effort to stop the bleeding .
labels: O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was a 53-year-old male with a longstanding history of renal disease with multiple complications and problems related to vascular access and hypercoagulable state .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O B-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: These culminated in an attempted cadaveric kidney transplant undertaken on 12/16/97 , which was complicated by thrombosis and necrosis of the cadaveric renal vein within 24 hours .
labels: O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O
O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O
O O O O O

text: The patient 's course was subsequently characterized by recurrent pneumonias , possibly due to aspiration , and by hemodynamic instability .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O B-PR O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: He was transferred to the Medical Intensive Care Unit from the Transplant Service for ventilatory management in the setting of hypotension .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O B-PR O

text: On transfer , the patient was not sedated , but was unresponsive and extremely dyssynchronous with the ventilator .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR O O O B-PR O B-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR O

text: The patient was found to have substantial auto PEEP with an elevated dead space .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: A pulmonary arteriogram on 01/03/98 demonstrated multiple pulmonary emboli , likely less than one week old , possibly introduced at the time of the renal vein thrombosis of 12/19/97 .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O

text: An inferior vena cava filter was placed ; lower extremity noninvasive studies were negative .
labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O

text: The patient required high pressures to ventilate adequately , possibly related to an abdominal compartment syndrome .
labels: O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient had undergone two abdominal procedures following explantation .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: The physiology at the time of transfer to the Medical Intensive Care Unit was consistent with a septic process .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: CT scan demonstrated retroperitoneal collection containing both free air and extravasated contrast material .
labels: B-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: For the concern of a perforated viscus , the patient was taken to exploratory laparotomy on 01/06/98 , during which the bowel was run without evidence of perforation .
labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O
O O O B-PR O

text: He was taken to fluoroscopy , where oral contrast was demonstrated to be extravasating through a posterior duodenum .
labels: O O O O B-TE O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O

text: For this reason , he was taken again to the operating room on 01/08/98 , at which time a gastrojejunostomy was performed with stapling across the gastroduodenal junction , introduction of five Jackson-Pratt drains into the retroperitoneal mass , cholecystotomy tube , gastrostomy tube , and jejunostomy tube .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR O O B-TR I-TR O

text: The patient had an extensive estimated blood loss requiring multiple blood products and fluid resuscitation therapy .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: Accompanying this during this period were elevations in liver function studies and amylase and lipase consistent with pancreatic inflammation .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-TE O B-TE O O B-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was aggressively treated with fluid resuscitation and pressors for his septic physiology .
labels: O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: There was no evidence of cardiac tamponade or specific underlying coronary dysfunction .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He was treated with appropriate antibiotics for his Serratia pneumonia , as well as for his abdominal process .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was felt to have an underlying hypercoagulable state , thought to be the source for the repeated clots .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Because of the bleeding problems , however , it was felt that full heparinization would not be prudent , and the patient was treated with pneumo-boots and subcutaneous heparin .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR I-TR O

text: Attention was paid to a variety of metabolic and electrolyte abnormalities , which were corrected appropriately .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O

text: Nonetheless , Mr. Less continued to remain critically ill with only very transient mild improvement with drainage of additional retroperitoneal fluid .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O B-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He remained pressor dependent , as well as dependent upon mechanical ventilatory assistance .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR O O O O B-PR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: His course was complicated by atrial fibrillation requiring cardioversion .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-TR O

text: He had an ongoing requirement for high volume resuscitation and was persistently acidotic despite CV-VVH in the face of bicarbonate replenishment .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O B-PR I-PR O B-TR O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: The patient also appeared to have stool from his Jackson-Pratt site and right oblique incision .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Bloody drainage from his increasingly distended abdomen was noted .
labels: B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O

text: Extensive discussions were carried out with Mrs. Less condition was irretrievable .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: It was felt that the patient had continued massive retroperitoneal contamination and probable multiple enteric fistulae from an ischemic bowel .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Dr. Cantsleddjesc felt that no surgical approach to this problem or further intervention or radiologic procedures would be helpful .
labels: O O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR O O O O

text: All physicians and the family were in agreement that the most appropriate approach was to institute comfort measures .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: This was done , and the patient appeared to be comfortable at the time of death with his family at his side on 1/16/98 .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Mr. Villesatelkscurb is a fifty year old black gentleman with a long history of hepatitis C , believed to be contracted during transfusions in a previous trauma .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient had recently prior to this admission , had a rise in his alpha feta protein and a biopsy of his liver had shown hepatocellular carcinoma .

text: Preoperatively , the patient underwent chemo-embolization for his hepatocellular carcinoma .
labels: O O O O O B-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The remainder of his preoperative course was benign .
labels: O O O O O O O O O

text: On July 15 , 1992 , a liver became available , and the patient underwent hepatectomy and orthotopic liver transplant .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: His operation was complicated by severe coagulopathy requiring fifty-nine units of packed red blood cells , 64 units of FFP and 34 units of platelets .
labels: B-TR I-TR O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O B-TR O O O O B-TR O

text: Postoperatively , the patient continued to have a coagulopathy requiring re-exploration on postoperatively day 2 , with findings only of hematoma and no active bleeding .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-TE O O O O O O O O O B-PR O O B-PR I-PR O

text: Initially , the patient did well in the Intensive Care Unit , mentally alert , and oriented , however , he continued to be coagulopathic and was requiring large amounts of blood and FFP transfusions , with a resultant pulmonary edema .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He developed renal failure felt to be ATN secondary to ischemia of his kidneys .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR O O O B-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient remained intubated in the Intensive Care Unit for twelve days prior to his death .
labels: O O O B-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: He had daily transfusions of FFP and blood , and continued coagulopathy .
labels: O O B-TR I-TR O B-TR O B-TR O O O B-PR O

text: He also developed thrombocytopenia , requiring persistent platelet transfusions on a daily basis .
labels: O O O B-PR O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O

text: His immunosuppression was OKT3 and Solu Medrol , and he underwent hemodialysis and ultra filtration to remove fluid .
labels: B-TR I-TR O B-TR O B-TR I-TR O O O O B-TR O B-TR I-TR O O O O

text: While in the ICU he developed seizures , requiring large amounts of intravenous Valium to break his seizures , and he was maintained on Tegretol and Dilantin .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O

text: However , he became progressively more mentally obtunded .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: During the seizure , he bit his tongue , resulting in a large bleed from his tongue , which was sutured by the ENT Service , however , his continued coagulopathy resulted in bleeding from his nasopharynx , which could never be identified , and also upper gastrointestinal bleeding .
labels: O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-TR O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Endoscopy never revealed specific sources of bleeding , although he appeared to have a diffuse duodenitis .
labels: B-TE O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He was started on Pitressin to try to control the gastrointestinal bleeding , but he continued to have severe bleeding , and became progressively hypotensive , with eventual bradycardia and cardiac arrest .
labels: O O O O B-TR O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O

text: He was pronounced dead at 3:49 PM on July 15 , 1992 .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O
