text: The patient underwent a left colectomy with end transverse colostomy , and oversewing of the descending colon .
labels: O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: Drainage of the pancreatic necrosis was also done .
labels: B-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O

text: The patient tolerated the procedure fairly well , and was transferred to the Intensive Care Unit .
labels: O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: In the Intensive Care Unit , the patient had a prolonged course .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient was then extubated on postoperative day #2 , but remained pressor-dependent .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O

text: He remained on imipenem , and Vancomycin was also started .
labels: O O O B-TR O O B-TR O O O O

text: Thereafter , the patient had a long and complicated postoperative course .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He was eventually transferred to the floor , where he remained meta-stable .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: He had repeated episodes of hypotension to 80-90 systolic/40-50 diastolic .
labels: O O O O O B-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE O
O O O O O

text: He also had repeated temperature spikes .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: After repeated work ups , it was felt that these were probably due to remaining infection in the peripancreatic area .
labels: O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: His drainage tube from the peripancreatic area was gradually advanced , and eventually discontinued .
labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O

text: Mr. Mass was placed on multiple courses of antibiotics .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR O

text: Most recently , he was on a 28 day course of Vancomycin , ofloxacin , and Flagyl , for blood cultures that were positive for gram positive cocci and enteric and non-enteric gram negative rods .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O O B-TR O O B-TE I-TE O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: This 28 day course was completed on 07/15/95 .
labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O

text: The patient was also treated initially with amphotericin-B and then with fluconazole for a computerized tomography guided aspirate of a small fluid collection around his pancreas , which grew Candida albicans .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR O O O B-TR O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: The patient also had several episodes of fungal cystitis with Torulopsis glabrata , going from his urine .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O O O B-TE I-TE O

text: He was treated with amphotericin-B bladder washes for this .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: Mr. Mass was initially anticoagulated for his left ventricular aneurysm .
labels: O O O O B-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He remained stable from a cardiac fashion .
labels: O O O O O O O O

text: He did have problems with po intake .
labels: O O O B-PR O O O O

text: He had repeated bouts of small-volume emesis that may have been secondary to reflux .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-PR O

text: He was treated with a variety of anti-emetics , most recently Granisetron , with only mild success .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR O O O B-TR O O O O O O

text: He remained total parenteral nutrition-dependent throughout his hospital course .
labels: O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O

text: By the end of June , it became clear that Mr. Mass would require aggressive surgical intervention in order to eradicate his intra-abdominal bursts of intermittent sepsis ; however , long discussions with the patient and his wife , who was his health-care proxy , revealed that they felt that no further aggressive intervention be attempted .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: Given the patient had an out of hospital arrest , remained unresponsive despite hemodynamic stability , he was treated with induced hypothermia and with cold packs and a cooling blanket were placed with goals of reducing his core body temperature to 32 degrees Celsius for a period of twelve hours at which point he would be rewarmed over the subsequent six hours .

text: The patient continued to demonstrate seizure activity despite this .

text: The patient is a 63 year-old woman transferred from Pre Health on June 19 , 1998 to the Verg Medical Center Intensive Care Unit for evaluation of thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura and bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: On May 12 , 1998 , the patient presented to Pre Health with fever , cough , dyspnea and a chest x-ray revealing a patchy infiltrate in the right lung .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR O B-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: She was treated with Clindamycin and Erythromycin which were changed to Trovan and then transferred to A Hospital .
labels: O O O O B-TR O B-TR O O O O B-TR O O O O O O O

text: On May 27 , 1998 , the patient desaturated to 40% with a temperature of 100.5 degrees .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O

text: Her oxygen saturations improved to only 92% on 100% face mask and she was admitted to Pre Health Intensive Care Unit .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Chest x-ray there revealed bilateral pulmonary infiltrates with increasing pleural effusion .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: A VQ scan was high probability , but no pulmonary angiogram was done and an echocardiogram revealed a normal left ventricle with no wall motion abnormality and an ejection fraction of 75% .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O

text: On May 24 , 1998 , the patient had a CT scan of the chest which revealed diffuse alveolar infiltrates at the right base , mediastinal lymphadenopathy and bilateral pleural effusions .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: At this point , a diagnosis of lupus was considered and her ANA was 1:640 and her rheumatoid factor and ANCA were negative .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR O O O B-TE I-TE O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-TE O O O

text: She was started on a steroid trial at that point .
labels: O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O

text: Her pleural fluid was tapped and it was negative for malignancy .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O

text: On June 11 , 1998 , the patient had a video assisted thoracoscopic study of the right lung which revealed chronic interstitial pneumonitis with a bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia-like reaction and a chest tube was placed .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: The patient was then started on 40 mg of Prednisone q. day .

text: At this time , it was believed that her clot was due to a rupture of this parathyroid adenoma .

text: Mr. Lockley was admitted with respiratory failure , thought to be related to mucus plugging as well as a pseudomonal pneumonia .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Both of these etiologies were treated , and he continued to oxygenate and ventilate well on his usual ventilator settings .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: However , the issue that dominated the admission was his recent acute decline in mental status .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He was thoroughly evaluated by neurology and underwent head CT , MRI , LP , and EEG .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O B-TE O B-TE O O B-TE O

text: This work-up demonstrated a small left basal ganglia infarct , likely cardioembolic .
labels: B-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR O

text: However , they felt this event could not account for his new , severe global deficit ; this was thought to be secondary to a more pervasive process , likely anoxic encephalopathy , for which the prognosis is extremely grim .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O

text: This was discussed at length in several family meetings involving the patient 's wife , son , primary care doctor , ICU attending , and neurology consultant in the presence of a Asian interpreter .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The end result of these discussion was that the patient 's wishes would not be consistent with this new level of functioning from which he had little hope of recovery ; the family decided to make him comfort measures only .

text: 1. Hypotension - The patient was initially mildly hypotensive with systolic blood pressures in the 80s .
labels: O B-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O

text: Upon admission it was unclear whether or not the patient was volume overloaded or volume depleted .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O

text: Initially he was treated with intravenous fluids with a dramatic response in his systolic blood pressure .
labels: O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O

text: However , subsequent it was determined that the patient 's hypotension may have been related to his rapid ventricular response and right heart failure .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Therefore the focus of treatment was changed to controlling his rate .
labels: O O O O B-TR O O O O B-TE I-TE O

text: 2. Atrial fibrillation - The patient 's Digoxin had been weaned off prior to his admission .
labels: O B-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O

text: It was felt that this potentially had lead to his atrial flutter and atrial fibrillation with rapid ventricular response .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was loaded once again with Digoxin and his beta blocker was increased to 100 mg of Lopressor , three times a day .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O B-TR O O O O O O

text: In addition the patient was started on Verapamil since his heart rate had remained mildly tachycardiac in the low 100s .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O

text: 3. Congestive heart failure - During the initial course of the patient 's admission , it was unclear as to whether or not he was volume overloaded or volume depleted .
labels: O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was initially treated with intravenous fluids , however , subsequently he was diuresed when he became symptomatic and short of breath .
labels: O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Chest x-rays revealed evidence of congestive heart failure .
labels: B-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The decision was made to have the patient undergo a cardiac catheterization to fully evaluate the hemodynamics to determine the etiology of the patient 's heart failure .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: In addition , plans were made to evaluate the patient 's cardiac arteries to determine if he had any component of ischemic cardiomyopathy .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: 4. Abnormal liver function tests - The patient had an isolated , elevated alkaline phosphatase with a confirmatory elevation in his gamma glutamyl transferase .
labels: O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O

text: An ultrasound of the right upper quadrant did not reveal any cholelithiasis or cholecystitis , however , an irregular hepatic contour was seen which is suggestive of underlying chronic liver disease .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: There was some concern that the patient may have a partial biliary obstruction and the patient was sent for an magnetic resonance cholangiopancreatography to further evaluate the biliary system .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O

text: Magnetic resonance cholangiopancreatography did not reveal any evidence of biliary dilatation or of any obstructing pancreatic mass .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: Again seen was a slightly irregular contour of the liver with dilated hepatic veins suggesting chronic hepatic vascular congestion .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient also revealed a prior history of heavy alcohol use for approximately 20 years , during the mid 1950s to mid 1970s .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: It was felt that he may have had some component of vascular congestion from his congestive heart failure as well as possibly some mild cirrhotic changes secondary to his previous alcohol use .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O

text: 5. Fall - The patient had a mechanical fall during his admission .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: He did not sleep at all the night before and was extremely fatigued .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: He was walking in the hall , dragging his intravenous pole when he tripped over the foot of the pole and lost his balance .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: He fell backwards , landing on his buttocks and bumped his head .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: His neurological examination at that time was nonfocal and the head was atraumatic without any evidence of a hematoma .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O O O O B-PR O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: A computerized axial tomography scan of his head at that time did not reveal any extra or intracranial hemorrhage .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: 6. Rectal bleeding - The patient has a history of rectal bleeding , ever since his brachytherapy for his prostate cancer .
labels: O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O B-TR I-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient has been treated with Argon laser therapy in the past for his rectal bleeding and it is recommended that he follow up with his gastroenterologist for repeat Argon laser therapy .

text: Mr. Robert Mackey is a 49 year old gentleman with a 22 year history of diabetes mellitus .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: He has a history of peripheral neuropathy , kidney transplantation in 2003 secondary to diabetic nephropathy , as well as throat cancer in 2004 treated with local resection and radical neck dissection on the left as well as postoperative radiation .
labels: O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: Mr.  Mackey also had signs and symptoms consistent with cervical myelopathy ; a cervical MRI scan showed very impressive disc herniations at C5-C6 , less so at C4-C5 , with clear cut cord compression , particularly on the right side C5-C6 .
labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O B-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE I-TE I-TE O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O

text: Therefore , he was admitted for C4-C5 and C5-C6 anterior diskectomy with autologous bone graft and instrumented fusion .
labels: O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-TR I-TR O
O O O

text: Postoperative physical examination demonstrated that he was afebrile at 97 degrees ; blood pressure 145/80 ; pulse 60 ; respiratory rate 10 ; 100% on a non-rebreather .
labels: B-TE I-TE I-TE O O O O B-PR O O O O B-TE I-TE O O B-TE O O B-TE I-TE O O O O B-TR I-TR O

text: He was awake , alert , uncomfortable secondary to incisional tenderness at neck site as well as right iliac graft site .

text: The wounds were clean , dry and intact , and flat .

text: His respiratory rate was 30 on face mask .

text: Interoperatively , he was positive two liters with a stable blood pressure and heart rate , although requiring some neo-synephrine interoperatively .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O B-TR I-TR O O

text: He responded to intravenous Lasix with 3.2 liters of urine output as well as marked clinical improvement .
labels: O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O O

text: The etiology for his congestive heart failure was determined likely to be diastolic dysfunction from increased heart rate as well as excess volume .

text: No definite evidence for significant myocardial ischemia , although cardiac enzymes were sent and he ruled out for myocardial infarction .

text: He was given Lasix to continue to diurese the excess volume .

text: The patient became agitated with both tent and Bi-PAP machine , although continued to saturate well .

labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O

text: 1. CORONARY ARTERY DISEASE : The patient was taken to Cardiac Catheterization where she was found to have two vessel disease .

text: The patient is a pleasant 83-year-old retired psychiatrist who presents with a chief complaint of gait difficulty for the last five to six months .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O

text: The patient has a history of laryngeal cancer in 2000 and 2001 , CVA in 2001 to 2002 and hypertension , who has a six month history of progressive difficulty in ambulation .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was in previously good health when he reports starting to notice problems ambulating about six months ago .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O

text: His partner also reports that he has been having more difficulty with ADLs .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: He reported that he began with difficulty buttoning his shirt for many years since after a stroke but now reports that on occasion she would ask him why he was doing certain things and he could not give a concrete example .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient was having a hard time walking and reports that he has felt weaker .
labels: O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O

text: He has had uncoordination of his feet and began having a cane four to five months ago with the increasing weakness .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: This was especially bad when trying to arise .
labels: O O O O O O O O O

text: The patient has seen his primary care physician who referred him to physical therapy for his gait weakness but his symptoms failed to improve .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR O B-PR I-PR O O O O

text: He continued to progress until two weeks prior to admission when he was found in the bathtub , unsteady and fell trying to steady himself .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O

text: The patient could not be moved and had to have 911 called for help .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

text: Since that time he had been ambulating with a walker and has had increasing difficulty with falls in the last two weeks .
labels: O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O

text: The patient was again seen by his primary care physician and a CG scan revealed a mass in the right parietal lobe .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The patient was referred to the Neurology Service for further workup of the mass .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-TE I-TE O B-PR I-PR O

text: The patient 's clinical situation was most consistent with a Pseudomonas cellulitis and subsequent sepsis .

text: Blood cultures drawn at the outside hospital grew out Pseudomonas that was sensitive to Imipenem and Tobramycin .

text: There were cultures obtained seeping from the wound at Retelk County Medical Center and those also grew out Pseudomonas aeruginosa .
labels: O O B-TE O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O

text: The organism grown at this institution was sensitive to Imipenem , Ceftazidime , Amikacin , gentamicin , Ciprofloxacin , Tobramycin but was resistant to Cefotetan , Ceftriaxone , Mezlocillin , Bactrim , Ampicillin , chloramphenicol , and sulbactam .

text: He was treated initially with Ceftazidime and gentamicin but there was a question about the organism 's susceptibility from lab studies done at the outside hospital .
labels: O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O O O O O O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O B-TE I-TE O O O O O O

text: He was subsequently switched to Imipenem and Tobramycin and was maintained on those medications throughout the hospital course .
labels: O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O O O O B-TR I-TR O O O O O

text: The Tobramycin and Imipenem were started on 11/25/94 .
labels: B-TR I-TR O B-TR O O O O O

text: In addition , the patient received a five day course of intravenous IgG to improve infection control .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O O B-TR I-TR O

text: Vancomycin was also added to his regimen on 11/28/94 and this was primarily to provide improved MRSA coverage as he continued to have erythema along the lateral right lower extremity .

text: He was evaluated by the Surgery Department and it is there feeling that there is no indication for surgical intervention / amputation at this time .
labels: O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-TR I-TR O B-TR O O O O

text: He is being maintained with twice daily Xeroform with Betadine changes .
labels: O O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O O

text: These dressing changes are applied by applying the Xeroform on Betadine initially and then changing it with sterile dry bandages .
labels: B-TR I-TR I-TR O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O O O O O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O

text: Of note , the patient has extreme pain with these dressing changes and requires parenteral morphine sulfate for pain control during dressing changes .
labels: O O O O O O B-PR I-PR O B-TR I-TR I-TR O O B-TR I-TR I-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: The plan is to complete a full course of Imipenem and Tobramycin for his Pseudomonas cellulitis .
labels: O O O O O O O O O B-TR O B-TR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O

text: As mentioned earlier he continues to have erythema tracking up his leg and up to his lateral thigh .
labels: O O O O O O O B-PR O O O O O O O O O O O

text: The cause of this erythema is not know at this time but has not shown extensive progression .
labels: O O O B-PR I-PR O O O O O O O O O O O O O
O O O

text: The patient was initially treated with Dopamine which was subsequently weaned off after his sepsis improved .

text: He was noted to be in rapid AF on several episodes receiving 5 mg IV Lopressor each time with improvement .

text: He has been in and out of atrial fibrillation and normal sinus rhythm .

labels: O O O O O O O B-PR O B-PR I-PR I-PR O O O O O O O
